title: Sprite Definition
description: Schema for sprite animation definitions in Yoshi's Wrath

atlas.description: Path to the sprite sheet image relative to assets folder

frame_width.description: Width of each frame in pixels

frame_height.description: Height of each frame in pixels

frames_horizontal.description: Number of frames arranged horizontally in the sprite sheet

frames_vertical.description: Number of frames arranged vertically in the sprite sheet

default_animation.description: Name of the animation to play by default

frames.description: Sequence of frame indices to play

frame_duration.description: Duration in seconds for each frame (used when use_per_frame_timing is false or absent)

per_frame_durations.description: Individual duration for each frame (must match length of frames array)

use_per_frame_timing.description: If true, use per_frame_durations instead of frame_duration

interruptible.description: Whether this animation can be interrupted by another animation

cooldown.description: Time in seconds before this animation can be played again after finishing
